about.title: About Me
about.description: A junior frontend developer eager to grow in the field of web development. I’ve completed relevant courses and built personal projects. I’m detail-oriented, responsible, and open to learning new technologies and working in a collaborative environment.Outside of tech, I enjoy swimming and going on long walks — activities that help me stay focused and energized. I’m looking for a junior frontend position where I can apply my skills, contribute to real-world projects, and grow as part of a motivated team.
